agency_desc: County veterans service officers are veterans employed by the county to act as liaisons with county residents for veteran issues, including but not limited to; providing forms, information, and assistance in obtaining state and federal veterans benefits.
service_description: Provides information about and assistance with veterans' benefits to veterans, their surviving spouses, and their children. County service officers can assist in the completion and submission of forms necessary to receive all appropriate federal and state veterans' benefits.
site_details: Call to make an appointment.
site_eligibility: Veteran, surviving spouses or children of a veteran

agency_desc: A nonprofit agency providing a variety of mental health services, including a crisis line, inpatient and outpatient services, and substance abuse services.
service_description: Provides assessment and outpatient counseling and treatment for people with substance abuse issues. Intensive outpatient services are available for adults.
taxonomy_category: Mental Health and Substance Use Disorder Services
Mental Health and Substance Use Disorder Services
Mental Health and Substance Use Disorder Services
Mental Health and Substance Use Disorder Services
Mental Health and Substance Use Disorder Services
site_details: Call for information or to schedule an appointment -- Walk in for emergency assessment or crisis intervention.
site_schedule: Office: Mon-Fri 8am-5pm -- Crisis Line: Daily 24 hours
Office: Mon-Fri 8am-5pm -- Crisis Line: Daily 24 hours
Office: Mon-Fri 8am-5pm -- Crisis Line: Daily 24 hours
Office: Mon-Fri 8am-5pm -- Crisis Line: Daily 24 hours
site_eligibility: Open

agency_desc: A government agency that provides household recycling and hazardous waste collection and education and information about recycling, reusing, and reducing environmental hazards.
service_description: Maintains drop-off sites around Jasper County for collecting recyclables including:  corrugated cardboard and box board, glass, numbers one and two plastics, aluminum, tin, and steel beverage and food cans, newspapers, and magazines.
site_details: Walk in, email, call, or visit the website for information.
site_schedule: Mon-Fri 7:30am-4pm -- Drop Off: Varies by site
Mon-Fri 7:30am-4pm -- Drop Off: Varies by site
site_eligibility: Residential households in the county

agency_name: BURR OAK MENNONITE CHURCH - SALVATION ARMY JASPER COUNTY
agency_desc: A faith-based organization that provides relief for Jasper County residents in need by assisting with rent, utilities, and food. Limits apply.
site_name: BURR OAK MENNONITE CHURCH - SALVATION ARMY JASPER COUNTY
service_name: SALVATION ARMY - JASPER COUNTY SERVICE EXTENSION
service_description: Provides financial assistance to Jasper County residents in need with a gas, electric, or water bill that is pending disconnect, or that is currently disconnected. Limited funds are also available for rental assistance. All assistance is provided on a case-by-case basis; no assistance for fees or deposits of any kind.
site_details: Call for more information or to schedule an appointment; no walk-ins accepted.
site_eligibility: Living in Jasper County -- With financial need (based on assessment)

agency_desc: Coordinates emergency management programs and response measures in Jasper County.
service_description: Offers weather alert radios to persons in need, while supplies last. Weather alert radios provide information for emergencies including hazardous weather, local area warnings, and current weather conditions from the National Weather Service.
site_details: Call for availability or to make a request.
site_schedule: Mon-Fri 8am-4pm -- After-hours Emergencies: On call, daily 24 hours
Mon-Fri 8am-4pm -- After-hours Emergencies: On call, daily 24 hours
Mon-Fri 8am-4pm -- After-hours Emergencies: On call, daily 24 hours
Mon-Fri 8am-4pm -- After-hours Emergencies: On call, daily 24 hours
Mon-Fri 8am-4pm -- After-hours Emergencies: On call, daily 24 hours
site_eligibility: Living in Jasper County -- Homeowners -- Mobile home occupants -- Low income

agency_desc: A church with worship services and charitable outreach, including a food pantry.
service_description: Provides perishable and nonperishable food to those in need. Open service area.
site_details: Drive through for service.
site_eligibility: Open

agency_desc: Provides governance and municipal services.
service_description: Oversees housing and commercial development and enforces zoning ordinances for the city of Rensselaer in Jasper County. This department issues permits and conducts inspections for construction and remodeling projects, responds to reports of overgrown weeds on private property, and handles zoning requests, complaints, and appeals.
nameLevel3: Land Use Planning and Regulation Services
site_details: Call or visit the website for information.
site_eligibility: Varies by service; services limited to properties within Rensselaer city limits

agency_desc: Provides governance and municipal services.
service_description: Provides street and sidewalk maintenance, storm-sewer maintenance, snow and ice control, dead animal pick-up, street-sign maintenance, and groundskeeping of public properties in the city of Rensselaer in Jasper County.
site_details: Call for information, to submit a request, or make a report.
site_eligibility: Open; serves the city of Rensselaer

agency_desc: Provides governance and municipal services.
service_description: Maintains and provides information about public park facilities and programming in the city of Rensselaer in Jasper County. Programs vary by season, but may include team sports, summer youth clubs, and after-school programs.
site_details: Walk in to visit the parks; call or visit the website for information.
site_schedule: Mon-Fri 7:30am-4pm -- Parks: Daily dawn to dusk, unless otherwise noted
site_eligibility: Parks are open to all; some programs may have specific requirements

agency_desc: A public library that provides access to fiction and non-fiction library materials to patrons of all ages.
service_description: Maintains a public lending library and provides phone-based reference assistance. In-house services include public computer and Internet access.
site_details: Walk in to apply for a library card, check out materials, or use in-house services. Call for information.
site_schedule: Mon and Wed 10am-7pm; Tues and Fri 10am-5pm; Sat 9am-1pm
Mon and Wed 10am-7pm; Tues and Fri 10am-5pm; Sat 9am-1pm
site_eligibility: Most in-house services, including computer stations: Open -- For a library card: Living in Carpenter Township

agency_desc: A nonprofit christian housing ministry that builds and renovates affordable housing for qualified individuals and families.
service_description: Builds homes for eligible low-income persons. Participants contribute a set number of hours of labor ("sweat equity") toward the construction of a dwelling that they may then purchase through a zero-interest, low monthly payment loan. Volunteer opportunities are also available for interested individuals and service groups.
site_details: Call for more information.
site_eligibility: Household income between set guidelines (call or see website for current amounts) -- Able to make payments (steady employment history or equivalent income) -- Currently have reasonably good credit

agency_desc: A nonprofit, community-based food pantry serving the towns of Demotte and the Fair Oaks in Jasper County.
service_description: Provides nonperishable food, frozen meat, dairy products, and bread to those in need. Limited service area.
site_details: Walk in.
site_eligibility: Living in the towns of Demotte (Jasper County) or Fair Oaks -- Limit to one (1) visit per month

agency_desc: A full-service hospital providing a wide range of medical services and emergency care.
service_description: Offers a full-service hospital providing a wide range of diagnostic, treatment, and health care programs, including 24-hour emergency care.
site_details: Walk in for emergency care. -- Call for additional information.
site_eligibility: Open

agency_desc: A full-service hospital providing a wide range of medical services and emergency care.
service_description: Provides primary and preventative health care services to those in need regardless of ability to pay.
site_details: Call or visit website to schedule an appointment.
site_eligibility: Open

agency_desc: An elected official responsible for administering the township, including such duties as providing township assistance, burial of the indigent, and maintaining the township budget.
service_description: May be able to assist township residents who are experiencing an unexpected crisis with basic needs, such as:  Essential utilities -- Burial/Cremation expenses -- Housing expense -- Work/Medical transportation -- Food/Clothing -- Necessary medications/medical care assistance is at the discretion of the trustee. Denials can be appealed to the county commissioner; information on appealing is included in the denial letter.
taxonomy_name: Prescription Drugs for Specific Health Conditions
nameLevel4: Prescription Drugs for Specific Health Conditions
site_details: Confirm correct Trustee by visiting www.censusreporter.org/locate and type in home address; township is shown as "county subdivision". -- Call to schedule an appointment.
site_eligibility: MUST LIVE IN TOWNSHIP (Visit www.censusreporter.org/locate and type in home address to discover township.) -- With financial need based on assessment -- Able to provide documentation of income and expenses for all household members

agency_desc: A nonprofit organization that offers a variety of services to the community including meals, transportation, and weatherization.
service_description: Provides curb-to-curb public  transportation services for people in need. Limited service area.
site_details: Call to request a ride.-- Outside of 3 mile radius call to preschedule a ride in advance.
site_eligibility: Living in Jasper County

agency_desc: A nonprofit organization that offers a variety of services to the community including meals, transportation, and weatherization.
service_description: Offers activities for older adults, including special interest classes, social activities, travel, and field trips.
site_details: Call or walk in for information.
site_eligibility: Age 60 and older

agency_desc: A nonprofit organization that offers a variety of services to the community including meals, transportation, and weatherization.
service_description: Provides a lunch meal to senior citizens living in Jasper County.
site_details: Walk in; meals must be reserved one day in advance.
site_eligibility: Age 60 or older for meals -- Age 55 and over for activities

agency_desc: A public library that provides access to fiction and non-fiction library materials to patrons of all ages.
site_name: JASPER COUNTY PUBLIC LIBRARY - RENSSELAER BRANCH
service_description: Maintains a public lending library and provides phone-based reference assistance. In-house services include public computer and Internet access.
site_details: Walk in to apply for a library card, check out materials, or use in-house services. -- Call for information.
site_eligibility: Most in-house services, including computer stations: Open -- For a library card: Living, working, or own property in Jasper County

agency_desc: A public library that provides access to fiction and non-fiction library materials to patrons of all ages.
site_name: JASPER COUNTY PUBLIC LIBRARY - DE MOTTE BRANCH
service_description: Maintains a public lending library and provides phone-based reference assistance. In-house services include public computer and Internet access.
site_details: Walk in to apply for a library card, check out materials, or use in-house services. -- Call for information.
site_schedule: Mon, Tues, Thurs 9am-8pm; Wed 9am-6pm; Fri and Sat 9am-5pm
Mon, Tues, Thurs 9am-8pm; Wed 9am-6pm; Fri and Sat 9am-5pm
site_eligibility: Most in-house services, including computer stations: Open -- For a library card: Living, working, or own property in Jasper County

agency_desc: A public library that provides access to fiction and non-fiction library materials to patrons of all ages.
site_name: JASPER COUNTY PUBLIC LIBRARY - WHEATFIELD BRANCH
service_description: Maintains a public lending library and provides phone-based reference assistance. In-house services include public computer and Internet access.
site_details: Walk in to apply for a library card, check out materials, or use in-house services. -- Call for information.
site_schedule: Mon, Wed, Thurs 9:30am-5:30pm; Tues 9:30am-8pm; Fri and Sat 9am-5pm
Mon, Wed, Thurs 9:30am-5:30pm; Tues 9:30am-8pm; Fri and Sat 9am-5pm
site_eligibility: Most in-house services, including computer stations: Open -- For a library card: Living, working, or own property in Jasper County

agency_desc: Provides governance and municipal services.
service_description: Provides water and sanitary sewer utility services.
nameLevel3: Land Use Planning and Regulation Services
site_details: Call for assistance. -- Bills may be paid online, in person, by mail, or by phone.
site_schedule: Daily dawn to dusk, unless otherwise noted
site_eligibility: Open

agency_desc: Provides governance and municipal services.
service_description: Provides street and sidewalk maintenance, storm-sewer maintenance, snow and ice control, dead animal pick-up, street-sign maintenance, trash and recycling pick-up, and grounds-keeping of public properties.
site_details: Call for information, to submit a request, or make a report.
site_eligibility: Open

agency_desc: Administers the elementary, middle, and high schools within the district.
service_description: Administers the elementary, middle, and high schools in this school district. Provides student transportation services and maintains information on school locations, enrollment, fees, and curricula. District provides information regarding special education services for students age 3-22 with disabilities.
site_details: Call for information about school assignments, transportation, or other issues. -- Contact the assigned school to enroll.
site_eligibility: Students living within the school district in grades K-12

agency_desc: Administers the elementary, middle, and high schools within the district.
service_description: Administers the elementary, middle, and high schools in this school district. Provides student transportation services and maintains information on school locations, enrollment, fees, and curricula. District provides information regarding special education services for students age 3-22 with disabilities.
site_details: Call for information about school assignments, transportation, or other issues. -- Contact the assigned school to enroll.
site_eligibility: Students living within the school district in grades K-12

agency_desc: A government entity that provides governance and municipal services for the town of Wheatfield in Jasper County.
service_description: Provides governance and municipal services for the town of Wheatfield in Jasper County. Responds to questions, complaints, and requests regarding town government and services.
nameLevel3: Land Use Planning and Regulation Services
site_details: Call or walk in for information.
site_eligibility: Open; serves the town of  Wheatfield in Jasper County

agency_desc: Provides governance and municipal services.
service_description: Provides water and sanitary sewer utility services for the town of Remington in Jasper County.
site_details: Call or walk in for assistance. Bills may be paid online, in person, or by mail; a drop box is located at this address.
site_schedule: Mon-Thurs 7am-noon and 1pm-4pm; Fri 7am-noon and 1pm-3pm -- Parks: Daily dawn to dusk, unless otherwise noted
site_eligibility: Open

agency_desc: A nonprofit organization that provides pregnancy counseling and support from a pro-life perspective, with charitable material assistance.
service_description: Provides pregnancy counseling and support from a pro-life perspective, offers referrals to prenatal care, adoption resources, and other abortion alternatives for persons in need. Free, confidential pregnancy testing and pregnancy verification are also available.
taxonomy_category: Mental Health and Substance Use Disorder Services
site_details: Walk in or call for information.
site_eligibility: Open

agency_desc: Provides electric service to customers within service area.
service_description: Provides electric service to customers in Jasper County and a portion of Newton County.
site_details: Call for assistance; bill can be paid online, in person, by mail, or by phone.
site_schedule: Outage Reporting: Daily 24 hours -- Office: Mon-Fri 7:30am-4pm
site_eligibility: Addresses within set boundaries in Jasper and Newton county

agency_desc: Government agency that locates, identifies, and appraises all taxable property in Jasper County.
service_description: Calculates the value of all taxable property in Jasper County, which is then used to assess taxes. Hears appeals of assessments, oversees reassessments, and maintains information on property description and ownership.
site_details: Call or visit the website for more information.
site_eligibility: Varies by service; limited to taxable property in Jasper County

agency_desc: Represents the state of Indiana in felony and misdemeanor criminal prosecutions, conducts criminal investigations, supervises Grand Jury proceedings, enforces child support orders, conducts juvenile adjudication and prosecution, enforces traffic violations, and provides information and assistance to victims of crime.
service_description: Represents the state of Indiana in all felony and misdemeanor criminal prosecutions resulting from crimes committed in Jasper County. The prosecutor's office also conducts criminal investigations, supervises Grand Jury proceedings, enforces child support orders, conducts juvenile adjudication and prosecution, enforces traffic laws, and provides information and assistance to victims of crime.
site_details: Varies; call for details.
site_schedule: Child Support Office: Mon-Fri 8am-4pm -- Indiana Kids Line (Payment Information): Recorded information daily 24 hours; live assistance Mon-Fri 7am-6pm
Child Support Office: Mon-Fri 8am-4pm -- Indiana Kids Line (Payment Information): Recorded information daily 24 hours; live assistance Mon-Fri 7am-6pm
site_eligibility: Varies by service

agency_desc: Serves as the state trial court for the county, hearing both civil and criminal cases.
service_description: Handles civil lawsuits for $6,000 or less, including contracts, collection of rent, evictions, and personal loans. Only corporations are required to be represented by an attorney and only on claims over $1,500. Landlord/tenant disputes must be filed in the township where the property is located.
site_details: Walk in or call for information.
site_eligibility: To file a lawsuit: Age 18 or older -- With a civil claim for less than $6,000 -- Meeting one of the following three requirements: Person being sued lives or works in Jasper County -- Matter resulting in lawsuit took place in Jasper County -- Matter resulting in lawsuit was to be performed in Jasper County

agency_desc: Serves as the state trial court for the county, hearing both civil and criminal cases.
service_description: Provides probation services for the Jasper County Circuit and Superior Courts, including supervising juvenile and adult offenders in the community and linking them with programs and services to support their rehabilitation.
site_details: Through the courts; call for information.
site_eligibility: Offenders assigned to probation by the Jasper County Court

agency_desc: A government agency that provides public health nursing, works to control the spread of communicable disease, investigates environmental hazards, and maintains vital records for the county.
service_description: Maintains records of all births and deaths that occur in the County and provides certified copies of birth and death certificates for fixed fees.
site_details: Walk in, download application from website, or call to have application sent by mail. -- Bring or mail in completed application, required documentation, and payment. -- Indiana birth certificates and death records may also be requested online at www.vitalchek.com; this service is offered by a third-party and is not directly affiliated with the health department.
site_eligibility: Births/deaths occurring in the County -- Individual named on the birth certificate, parent, or other adult with a legal right to the certificate

agency_desc: The County Clerk maintains records of all civil and criminal court activities; administers jury draw, child support collections, and voter registration; issues marriage licenses; and records state tax liens.
service_description: Issues, provides, and maintains marriage licenses issued in the county. No witnesses, blood tests, or waiting period are required to obtain one. Both applicants must appear at the time of application. Marriages must take place within 60 days of the marriage license being issued.
taxonomy_name: Criminal Record Expungement Petition Filing Offices
nameLevel4: Criminal Record Expungement Petition Filing Offices
site_details: Walk in. Marriage license forms may be completed in advance online or in the clerk's office.
site_schedule: Mon-Fri 8am-4pm -- Indiana Kids Line (Payment Information): Recorded information daily 24 hours; live assistance Mon-Fri 6am-5pm
site_eligibility: Marriage license: Both parties at least age 18 (call or visit website for exceptions) -- At least one applicant from this county -OR- both from out of state -- Certified copies: License must have been issued in this county

agency_desc: Provides law enforcement, crime investigation, crime prevention, emergency assistance, and other police duties.
service_description: Provides law enforcement, crime investigation, crime prevention, emergency assistance, and other police duties for the city of Rensselaer in Jasper County. Persons in need of emergency police assistance should call 9-1-1.
site_details: Call 9-1-1 for emergency assistance. For non emergency services, call the office during business hours or call Rensselaer city dispatch after hours.
site_eligibility: Open; serves the city of Rensselaer

agency_desc: A cooperative of school districts that provides centralized special education services to students living within the boundaries of the participating school districts.
service_description: Provides education support for students with disabilities and special needs. Services range from consultation to resource rooms to self-contained classrooms, depending on the individual needs of the student. Assessment and special education services are generally accessed through the assigned public school.
site_details: Call for information
site_eligibility: Living in Benton, Jasper, Newton, and Pulaski County -- Aged 3-22 -- With any form of disability that requires special education services (determined by assessment)

agency_desc: Serves as the executive and administrative authority.
service_description: Serves as the executive and administrative authority, including performing the following duties: controls, maintains, and supervises county property; audits and authorizes claims against the county; receives bids for and authorizes county contracts; performs certain election functions; handles appeal of township trustee decisions.
site_details: Email for assistance.
site_eligibility: Varies by service
